short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper extension for the Webfolio MacOS bookmark manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Speed up the workflow with Webfolio, the MacOS menu bar bookmark manager!

The Webfolio helper is a dynamic web extension designed to work in tandem with our menu bar bookmark manager. This handy tool streamlines the process of adding bookmarks, making it faster and more intuitive than ever.

Key Features:

Instant Bookmark Addition: With a single click, it lets you save any webpage directly to your menu bar bookmark manager. No need for manual addition.

Seamless Integration: Designed to complement your existing menu bar bookmark manager, the extension acts as a bridge, ensuring smooth and rapid transfer of bookmarks to the manager.

Folder Selection Made Easy: Directly choose the folder within your bookmark manager where you want to save your bookmark, right from the extension. Organize as you go, without ever leaving your current tab.
